trans-unit.source: Defines row-specific properties that apply to <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Grid" /> elements.
trans-unit.target: 定義套用至 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Grid" /> 項目的資料列特定屬性。

trans-unit.source: You must set a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition> for each row in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>.
When you set a row-specific <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition>, you assign unique sizing properties to each row.
trans-unit.target: 當您將資料列特定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition>，您將唯一的調整大小屬性指派給每個資料列。

trans-unit.source: To set a group of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition> elements by using code, add the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition> to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定的群組<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition>項目，使用程式碼中，加入<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition>至<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition> class exposes only height properties.
To set width properties in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>, create an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition>.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定寬度屬性在<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>，建立的執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that represents the calculated height of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition" /> 之計算高度的值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the calculated height in device independent pixels.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Double" />，表示計算的高度 (以與裝置無關的像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: When you use these values in the same code example, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MinHeight%2A> value takes precedence over the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MaxHeight%2A> value, which in turn takes precedence over the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.Height%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: 當您在相同的程式碼範例中，使用這些值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MinHeight%2A>值優先順序高於<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MaxHeight%2A>值接著會優先於<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.Height%2A>值。

trans-unit.source: When you add or remove rows or columns, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A> for all <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition> elements and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.ActualHeight%2A> of all <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition> elements becomes zero until <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: 當您新增或移除資料列或資料行，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A>所有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition>項目和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.ActualHeight%2A>所有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition>項目會變成零，直到<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A>呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Gets the calculated height of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition" /> element, or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" /> value of a row that is defined by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition" /> 項目的導出高度，或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition" /> 所定義之資料列的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" /> that represents the height of the row.
trans-unit.target: 表示資料列高度的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" />。

trans-unit.source: When you use these values in the same code example, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MinHeight%2A> value takes precedence over the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MaxHeight%2A> value, which in turn takes precedence over the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.Height%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: 當您在相同的程式碼範例中，使用這些值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MinHeight%2A>值優先順序高於<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MaxHeight%2A>值接著會優先於<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.Height%2A>值。

trans-unit.source: When you add or remove rows or columns, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A> for all <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition> elements and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.ActualHeight%2A> of all <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition> elements becomes zero until <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: 當您新增或移除資料列或資料行，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A>所有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition>項目和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.ActualHeight%2A>所有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition>項目會變成零，直到<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A>呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that represents the maximum height of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition" /> 的最大高度。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the maximum height.

When you use these values in the same code example, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MinHeight%2A> value takes precedence over the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MaxHeight%2A> value, which in turn takes precedence over the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.Height%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: 當您在相同的程式碼範例中，使用這些值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MinHeight%2A>值優先順序高於<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MaxHeight%2A>值接著會優先於<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.Height%2A>值。

trans-unit.source: When you add or remove rows or columns, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A> for all <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition> elements and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.ActualHeight%2A> of all <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition> elements becomes zero until <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: 當您新增或移除資料列或資料行，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A>所有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition>項目和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.ActualHeight%2A>所有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition>項目會變成零，直到<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A>呼叫。

trans-unit.source: String representation of a <xref:System.Double> value equal to or greater than `0.0034` but equal to or less than `160000`.
trans-unit.target: 字串表示法<xref:System.Double>值等於或大於`0.0034`但等於或小於`160000`。

trans-unit.source: An unqualified value is measured in device independent pixels.
trans-unit.target: 不合格的值是以與裝置無關的像素為單位。

trans-unit.source: Strings need not explicitly include decimal points.
trans-unit.target: 字串不需要明確地包含小數位數。

trans-unit.source: A *double* value as described above, (excepting `Auto`) followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`.
trans-unit.target: A *double*值 （如上所述），(excepting `Auto`) 後面接著一個下列單元規範： `px`， `in`， `cm`， `pt`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that represents the minimum allowable height of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition" /> 的最小允許高度。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the minimum allowable height.
trans-unit.target: 表示最小允許高度的 <see cref="T:System.Double" />。

trans-unit.source: When you use these values in the same code example, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MinHeight%2A> value takes precedence over the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MaxHeight%2A> value, which in turn takes precedence over the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.Height%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: 當您在相同的程式碼範例中，使用這些值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MinHeight%2A>值優先順序高於<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MaxHeight%2A>值接著會優先於<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.Height%2A>值。

trans-unit.source: When you add or remove rows or columns, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A> for all <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition> elements and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.ActualHeight%2A> of all <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition> elements becomes zero until <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: 當您新增或移除資料列或資料行，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A>所有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition>項目和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.ActualHeight%2A>所有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition>項目會變成零，直到<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A>呼叫。

trans-unit.source: String representation of a <xref:System.Double> value equal to or greater than `0.0034` but equal to or less than `160000`.
trans-unit.target: 字串表示法<xref:System.Double>值等於或大於`0.0034`但等於或小於`160000`。

trans-unit.source: An unqualified value is measured in device independent pixels.
trans-unit.target: 不合格的值是以與裝置無關的像素為單位。

trans-unit.source: Strings need not explicitly include decimal points.
trans-unit.target: 字串不需要明確地包含小數位數。

trans-unit.source: A *double* value as described above, (excepting `Auto`) followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`.
trans-unit.target: A *double*值 （如上所述），(excepting `Auto`) 後面接著一個下列單元規範： `px`， `in`， `cm`， `pt`。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that represents the offset value of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition" /> 的位移值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the offset of the row.
